dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description:
Python interface to Basix, a finite element definition and tabulation
runtime library
dependencies.name: py-fenics-basix

dependencies.description:
The Unified Form Language (UFL) is a domain specific language for
declaration of finite element discretizations of variational forms. More
precisely, it defines a flexible interface for choosing finite element
spaces and defining expressions for weak forms in a notation close to
mathematical notation.
dependencies.name: py-fenics-ufl

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependencies.name: py-pytest

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.
dependencies.name: py-sympy

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

environment
